content.description:
Start standing in the dihedral with a low left hand nubbin and high right hand undercling, then power up through juggy ledges and a crimp or two.



Facing the boulder from the road, this problem is on its left side in the second slight overhang. (The first overhang, with the long obvious undercling feature, is a different, harder problem.)

1-2 pads. The hard moves are very easy to protect.

climbs.name: It's My Duty to Please Da' Booty

content.description:
Start sitting with a wide pinch undercling for the left hand and a left-facing shelf for the right. Power up through good holds to a sloping topout with a few key positive holds.



Facing the boulder from the road, this one's on the right side wall.

1-3 pads depending on your comfort level. The landing is pretty clean and it's not too tall, so you don't really need a spotter.

A steep roadside boulder littered with hard and often mossy problems. This one doesn't seem to get a ton of traffic.

Downclimb the right side of the slab that faces the road. There are plenty of holds and the climbing is quite secure once you find them.
